message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you a great deal on this amazing product. It's a one-of-a-kind item that I think you'll really love. I'm willing to sell it to you for $120.
I'm really interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $90. I'm willing to make a fair offer, but I have to stay within my budget.
I understand you're looking to stay within your budget, Bob. However, I've got to make a profit on this sale. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I'm counteroffering at $110.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, Alice, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to pay $95 for the product. Can you consider that price?

I'm glad you're willing to make a serious offer, Bob. However, I've got to make sure I get a good deal. I'm willing to compromise, but I need to get closer to my minimum price. I'm counteroffering at $105.
I'm getting close to my budget, but I'm not quite there yet. I'm willing to pay $98 for the product. Can you meet me at this price?

I'm glad we're getting close to a deal, Bob. I'm willing to make one last push to get closer to my minimum price. I'm counteroffering at $110. This is my final offer, so if you're interested, now's the time to make a decision.
